## ValidationErrorXMetadata type

Metadata type for validation errors. Designed to capture all relevant Zod validation context.

**Signature:**

```typescript
type ValidationErrorXMetadata = {
    field?: string;
    path?: (string | number)[];
    zodCode?: string;
    expected?: string;
    received?: string;
    issueCount?: number;
    issues?: ZodIssue[];
};
```
**References:** [ZodIssue](./error-x.zodissue.md)
